title: Pan wo Nameruna!
description: No education, no work experience, no friends. Muyu Uchiki is a nineteen-year old girl who's been a shut-in for two years, she lives a self-indulgent life, but a turning point comes for her?!She gets a call from her aunt in Kamakura about helping out at her bakery. A heartwarming comedy about a girl struggling in a bakery in Kamakura!
author: Ryuuichi Sadamatsu

2.title: Episode 2 - Ai-chan and the Mascot Bread
